name: Jewel Quest: Best Match 3 Games
description:
The original match 3 game is back - and better than ever. Are you a match 3 fan? Have you experienced the game that started the phenomenon?

Can you spot the match before it happens? Test your mental prowess in this fun and frantic match 3 adventure. Endless challenges await in this brain-bending puzzler as you explore the mysterious Isles of Illusion. Uncover their secrets... and survive their dangers!

CLASSIC GAMEPLAY
Match 3 has never been so exciting. Enjoy classic match 3 gameplay while experiencing tons of unexpected twists. Can you master even the most challenging levels?

WEEKS OF ENTERTAINMENT!
Enjoy over 200 fantastic levels providing weeks of entertainment!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Login with Facebook Connect to see how you stack up against your friends! Challenge your friends and and then crush their scores!

NEW JEWELS
Think you are a match 3 master? Think again - new jewels and rules shake up the rules of match 3, challenging you more than ever before.

COLLECT SPECIAL TOOLS
Special power boosts and the lion coins help you complete jewel boards in record time!

POWER UPS TO BLOW THROUGH THE COMPETITION
Collect relics along the way to help you complete even the hardest of the jewel boards. BONUS: Once you get a relic - its powers are permanent!

GORGEOUS BACKDROPS
There are 14 stunning islands to explore!
